name: uk-phone---area-code
title: UK Phone - Area Code Checker / Mobile Network
description: Quickly lookup a phone number area code.
author: Hybes

commands.name: lookup-number
commands.title: Lookup Number
commands.description: Lookup UK area code from a phone number

commands.name: lookup-place
commands.title: Lookup Place
commands.description: Lookup area codes by place name

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
